Class AuthenticationController

java.lang.Object
control.AuthenticationController
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserAuthenticationController, UserManagementController, UserPersistenceController
public class AuthenticationController extends Object implements UserAuthenticationController, UserManagementController, UserPersistenceController
The AuthenticationController class handles all user authentication, registration, and credential management for the BTO Management System. It supports password validation, user loading and saving, role checks, and NRIC verification. Interfaces implemented: - UserAuthenticationController - UserManagementController - UserPersistenceController
